name: Jumpshroom
description:
Play as a hungry Mushroom, who wants to reach the top of a very high tree and gather the biggest fruit of them all.

Mechanics include mainly jumping, which can be done by holding the space button to increase the jumping power, but also bouncing off of walls and sliding down slopes. Also, there is no death and instant return to the last checkpoint. Instead, mistakes can lead to falling back down to certain points on the map. So there's a real consequence to your actions. But I might be the tiniest bit of evil there as well... :)

I plan to build in an extra mode, where you can return to your last standing point.

Have Fun.
